QPopMenuItems.QPopMenuItem:
def Switch_Init(): #Don't rename this function if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("duplicate.polygons") == 1: return True return False
def Switch_Execute(): #Don't rename this function Application.SetValue("Preferences.duplicate.polygons", not Switch_Init())
#Weld selected points towards their common center Application.ApplyTopoOp("WeldPoints")

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Top\")") eval(stri) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera ("","","", viewIndices[oView])

def Switch_Init(): #Don't rename this function State = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") == 2 return State
def Switch_Execute(): #Don't rename this function if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") != 2: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 2, "") else: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 0, "")

def Switch_Init(): #Don't rename this function State = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") == 1 return State
def Switch_Execute(): #Don't rename this function if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue("Camera.orbitselected") != 1: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 1, "") else: Application.SetValue("preferences.Camera.orbitselected", 0, "")

Sel = (str(Application.Selection(0))) Application.Commands("Duplicate Single Mesh Component").Execute() Application.Commands("Collapse").Execute() Application.SelectGeometryComponents((Sel)) Application.SelectAdjacent("", "Point", False)

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"User\")") eval(stri)

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Right\")") eval(stri) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera ("","","", viewIndices[oView])

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") cmd = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Front\")") eval(cmd) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera (3,True,"", viewIndices[oView])

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") cmd = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Front\")") eval(cmd) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera ("","","", viewIndices[oView])

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Top\")") eval(stri) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera (2,True,"", viewIndices[oView])

oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") cmd = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Right\")") eval(cmd) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera (1,True,"", viewIndices[oView])

QPopMenus.QPopMenu: def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #This function must not be renamed! #Add your script code here pass

def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! oMenu.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) for oLight in Lights: oLightItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oLightItem.name = oLight.FullName
Code = "bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue('preferences.Interaction.autoinspect')
" Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("" + oLight.FullName + "");
" Code += ("else: Application.SelectObj('" + oLight.FullName + "','','');") Application.LogMessage (Code)
oLightItem.code = Code oMenu.appendTempMenuItem (oLightItem)

def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function!
oMenu.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )\n') Code+= ('oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")\n') Code += ('oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "\","' + oCam.FullName + '")\n')
#Code += "bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2\n" #Code += "bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue(\"preferences.Interaction.autoinspect\")\n" #Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj((\"" + oCam.FullName + ".camvis\",\"" + oCam.FullName + ".rotoscope\"))"
oCamItem.code = Code oMenu.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function!
#Lets find the current viewport under the mouse and activate it so we can work with a specific view further down. #This makes view operations more predictable in case the user clicks on a menu entry in a long menu that overlaps another view #In which case the wrong view would be affected.
oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) #oView = oVM.Views( Application.GetViewportUnderMouse() ); #oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("viewportundermouse") #Application.LogMessage(oView) #Application.SetFocusedViewport("A") oVM.SetAttributeValue("focusedviewport",oView)
oMenu.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('Application.SelectObj("' + oCam.FullName + '", "", "")\n') Code += "bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2\n" Code += "bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue(\"preferences.Interaction.autoinspect\")\n" #Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj((\"" + oCam.FullName + ".camvis\",\"" + oCam.FullName + ".rotoscope\"))" Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj(\"" + oCam.FullName + ".Camera\",)"
oCamItem.code = Code oMenu.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

QPopMenuDisplayContexts.QPopMenuDisplayContext: def QPopContext_Eval(SelInfo): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(Application.Selection) > 0): #Is something selected? oSelection = Application.Selection(0) if oSelection.Type == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True selType = oSelection.Type if ((selType == "edgeSubComponent") or (selType == "pntSubComponent") or (selType == "polySubComponent")): oParentObj = oSelection.Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if oParentObj.Type == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
